/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves forming a canopy that filters the sunlight, casting dappled shadows on the pavement below. Cars are parked neatly on the side of the road, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sun. Buildings rise in the background, their facades adorned with balconies and windows, adding architectural interest to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, illuminating the entire scene with a warm, inviting glow.
